1.12.2.1.1.0:
Now works on server!
Frontiers keep track of creator/owner.
Fixed bug in Index. Unnamed frontiers have incorrect characters.
Fixed bug in saved frontiers. Name visibility is not saved.
1.12.2.1.2.0:
Now you can change who can edit, create and delete frontiers! (Default key: F8).
Fixed marker of selected vertex not showing.
1.12.2.1.2.1: Fixed bug that prevented the player from creating frontiers and editing settings in singleplayer.
1.12.2.1.3.0:
Now you can assign a banner to the frontiers.
Added a HUD that shows the name, owner and banner of the frontier you're on now.
On the settings screen (F8 default key) you can edit the frontiers and HUD options.
1.12.2.1.3.1: Fixed bug that prevented the frontier slice value from being saved.
1.12.2.1.3.2:
Added Russian translation (Created by Articuno https://pixelmon.pro).
Fixed bug that crashed the client when a banner without patterns was assigned to a frontier.
1.12.2.1.3.3: Fixed bug that forced the client to disconnect from the server when assigning a banner to a frontier.
1.12.2.1.4.0:
Added personal frontiers!.
Added the personal frontier book.
Restructured frontiers.dat and added unique ID to each frontier.
The book now shows the coordinates of the selected vertex.
Added credits tab to the settings screen.
Made some optimizations and fixed some minor bugs.
1.12.2.1.5.0:
Send frontier updates to the server after each change.
Removed chat messages about frontiers changes.
Optimized the amount of data that is sent in the packages.

1.16.5.1.5.2: Fixed: crash when many non-ascii characters are entered in a frontier name.
1.16.5.2.0.0: Frontier books are no longer used, mod GUI is inside JourneyMap fullscreen map.
1.16.5.2.1.1:
Fixed: mixed filterOwner and filterDimension configs causing a crash.
Fixed: filter configs are within the hud category.

1.17.1.1.5.2: Fixed: crash when many non-ascii characters are entered in a frontier name.
1.17.1.2.0.0: Frontier books are no longer used, mod GUI is inside JourneyMap fullscreen map.
1.17.1.2.1.1:
Fixed: mixed filterOwner and filterDimension configs causing a crash.
Fixed: filter configs are within the hud category.

1.18.1.2.0.0: Frontier books are no longer used, mod GUI is inside JourneyMap fullscreen map.
1.18.1.2.1.1:
Fixed: mixed filterOwner and filterDimension configs causing a crash.
Fixed: filter configs are within the hud category.

1.18.2.2.0.0: Frontier books are no longer used, mod GUI is inside JourneyMap fullscreen map.
1.18.2.2.1.1:
Fixed: mixed filterOwner and filterDimension configs causing a crash.
Fixed: filter configs are within the hud category.
1.18.2.2.1.3-beta1:
Added: initial shape for new frontiers.
Added: buttons to control the visibility of the name and owner of each frontier.
Added: random color button.
Added: inactive state to color picker when not allowed to modify frontier.
Added: hideNamesThatDontFit config.
Added: Spanish translations to the configs.
Changed: improved the names of the configs in the settings screen.
Changed: Select Frontier now locates the frontier on the map.
Changed: improved the distribution of random colors.
Changed: rearranged the buttons in Frontier Info to fit a 1080p screen scaled to 3.
Changed: frontier list keeps selection when updated.
Removed: alwaysShowUnfinishedFrontiers config.
Fixed: opening context menu by editing a frontier on an unselected vertex does not select it.
